      • transferUser

        public ReferenceTokenPair transferUser(User user,
                              java.lang.String schoolRef,
                              java.lang.String partnerExternalRef,
                              java.lang.String partnerAccessToken,
                              java.lang.String note)
                                throws TransferUserException
        Description copied from interface: AccountService
        Transfer the user from Partner to ASSISTments. First it checks if partnerExternalRef already exists. If it doesn't, a new user will be created inside ASSISTments, and system will assign this user to a certain school. Store the association between new ASSISTments user and Partner user into database. If it does exist, external reference and access token will be fetched from database.
        Specified by:
        transferUser in interface AccountService
        Parameters:
        user - -- It contains information about this user, like user type, first name, last name ...
        schoolRef - -- External reference for a certain school. This comes from ASSISTments.
        partnerExternalRef - -- Partner external reference for this user. This comes from Partner.
        partnerAccessToken - -- Partner access token for this user. This comes from Partner.
        note - -- To keep extra information
        Returns:
        ReferenceTokenPair object. It contains external reference and access token for this user.
        Throws:
        TransferUserException

      • createUser

        public ReferenceTokenPair createUser(User user,
                            java.lang.String thirdParyId,
                            java.lang.String thirdPartyAccessToken,
                            java.lang.String note)
                              throws TransferUserException
        Description copied from interface: AccountService
        Create a new user inside ASSISTments. Store the association between new user and Partner user into database.
        Specified by:
        createUser in interface AccountService
        Parameters:
        user - -- It contains information about this user, like user type, first name, last name ...
        thirdParyId - -- Partner external reference for this user. This comes from Partner.
        thirdPartyAccessToken - -- Partner access token for this user. This comes from Partner.
        note - -- To keep extra information
        Returns:
        ReferenceTokenPair object. It contains external reference and access token for this user.
        Throws:
        TransferUserException

      • update

        public void update(PartnerToAssistments pta)
        Description copied from interface: AccountService
        Update table for this user based on user external reference outside and inside ASSISTments I assume external_reference and partner_external_reference shouldn't change over the time. So please be aware that this method is intended to update assistments_access_token, partner_access_token and note
        Specified by:
        update in interface AccountService
        Parameters:
        pta - -- an object represents external user
